message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is significantly higher than what I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to offer $10,000 for the product.  This reflects the value I see in it while also giving you a fair price.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14,000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value I have in the product.

Alice, I understand your position, but $14,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000 for the product. This is a fair compromise considering our previous discussions, and it's the highest I'm able to go at this point.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $12,000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $16,000, which is a compromise that's closer to my minimum price. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
